title: Fix chat UI friend list and feed post image display

requirements.text: Fix the ChatPage friend list sidebar to correctly display all friends so users can see and select multiple friends for chatting instead of seeing an empty or incomplete list

quotes: CHAT UI BUG MULTIPLE FRIEND NOT SHOW FOR CHAT FIX THIS IISSUE

acceptanceCriteria: All confirmed friends appear in the chat sidebar friend list
Users can click on any friend to open a chat conversation
The friend list updates when friendships are added or removed
Empty state displays appropriately when user has no friends

requirements.text: Fix the FeedPage PostCard component to properly display post images so users can see the photos in posts instead of only seeing captions

quotes: POST PHOTO IS NOT SHOWING ON FEED ONLY CAPTION IS SHOW

acceptanceCriteria: Post images render correctly in the feed when posts have images attached
Image URLs are properly constructed from backend blob data
Images display with appropriate dimensions and aspect ratios
Posts without images still display captions correctly
Loading states show while images are being fetched

constraints: Do not modify backend data structures or API methods
Preserve existing authentication and Internet Identity integration
Maintain read-only status of frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts and frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Keep all UI components using the established Shadcn + Tailwind stack
nonGoals: Adding new chat features beyond fixing the friend list display
Redesigning the feed layout or post card structure
Modifying how images are uploaded or stored in the backend
Adding image filters or editing capabilities
